    • Method Detail

      • closeStore

        void closeStore()
                throws JasDBStorageException
        Close the store
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to close the store cleanly

      • isLastShutdownClean

        boolean isLastShutdownClean()
                            throws JasDBStorageException
        Checks whether the last shutdown was done cleanly
        Returns:
        True if the last shutdown was clean, False if not
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to determine if last shutdown is clean

      • addMetadataEntity

        long addMetadataEntity(SimpleEntity entity)
                       throws JasDBStorageException
        Generic operation to add a metadata entity to the metadata store
        Parameters:
        entity - The metadata entity to add
        Returns:
        The data pointer for the metadata record
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to add the metadata entity

      • updateMetadataEntity

        long updateMetadataEntity(SimpleEntity entity,
                        long previousRecord)
                          throws JasDBStorageException
        Generic operation to update a metadata entity in the metadata store
        Parameters:
        entity - The updated entity
        previousRecord - The previous record pointer
        Returns:
        The new record pointer
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to update the entity

      • deleteMetadataEntity

        void deleteMetadataEntity(long recordPointer)
                          throws JasDBStorageException
        Deletes a generic metadata entity
        Parameters:
        recordPointer - The record pointer
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to delete the entity

      • getBags

        List<Bag> getBags(String instanceId)
                  throws JasDBStorageException
        Gets the bags for the given instanceId
        Parameters:
        instanceId - The instanceId
        Returns:
        The list of bags for that instance
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to load the bags

      • getBag

        Bag getBag(String instanceId,
         String bag)
           throws JasDBStorageException
        Gets the a specific bag in an instance
        Parameters:
        instanceId - The instanceId
        bag - The name of the bag
        Returns:
        The bag if present, null if not
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to load the bag

      • containsBag

        boolean containsBag(String instanceId,
                  String bag)
                    throws JasDBStorageException
        Checks if a bag in an instance exists in the metadata store
        Parameters:
        instanceId - The instance in which the bag should exist
        bag - The bag that should exist
        Returns:
        True if the bag exists in the instance, False if not
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to check if the bag exists in the instance

      • addBag

        void addBag(Bag bag)
            throws JasDBStorageException
        Adds a new bag to the storage
        Parameters:
        bag - The bag to add
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to add the bag

      • addBagIndex

        void addBagIndex(String instanceId,
               String bagName,
               IndexDefinition indexDefinition)
                 throws JasDBStorageException
        Adds an index to an existing bag in a certain instance
        Parameters:
        instanceId - The instance that contains the bag
        bagName - The bag to add the index to
        indexDefinition - The index definition
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to add the index

      • removeBagIndex

        void removeBagIndex(String instanceId,
                  String bagName,
                  IndexDefinition indexDefinition)
                    throws JasDBStorageException
        Parameters:
        instanceId - The instance that contains the bag
        bagName - The bag to remove the index from
        indexDefinition - The index definition
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to remove the index

      • containsIndex

        boolean containsIndex(String instanceId,
                    String bagName,
                    IndexDefinition indexDefinition)
                      throws JasDBStorageException
        Checks if the index is already present in the metadata store
        Parameters:
        instanceId - The instance that contains the bag
        bagName - The bag to check the index presence on
        indexDefinition - The index definition
        Returns:
        True if the index is already present, False if not
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to check if the index is present

      • removeBag

        void removeBag(String instanceId,
             String name)
               throws JasDBStorageException
        Remove a bag from the metadata store
        Parameters:
        instanceId - The name of the instance holding the bag
        name - The name of the bag
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to remove the bag

        List<Instance> getInstances()
                            throws JasDBStorageException
        Gets the registered instances
        Returns:
        The list of known instances
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to get the list of instances

                     throws JasDBStorageException

        Returns:
        The instance if found, null if not
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to get the instance

                    throws JasDBStorageException

        instanceId - The instance to remove
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to remove the instance

      • getMetadataProvider

        <T extends MetadataProvider> T getMetadataProvider(String type)
        Gets a metadata provider that can handle non standard metadata stored in the metadata store
        Type Parameters:
        T - The subtype of the metadata provider
        Parameters:
        type - The type of metadata provider requested
        Returns:
        The metadataprovider if it exists
